entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
